name: At the feminist boot-camp - wir machen das hier nicht zum Spass!!!
description:
"...where innocent young women are turned into unnatural, coldhearted man-haters with hairy armpits and no bra!!!"
Dr. Paraphylia, well known for his investigative journalism, visits a Boot-Camp for Feminists and reports in detail about the shockingly rude manners over there.
......................................................................................................
Dr. Paraphylia, april 2013, 8 pages, stapled, first printing: 50 copies in English and 50 copies in German, numbered by the artist

ONLY GERMAN VERSION LEFT

name: Lies die kind
description:
"...It's a brief, powerful and striking attempt to get at an interesting idea. Loge is an extremely clever cartoonist who puts her formal inventiveness to good use."
Robert Clough on High-Low

"... it's hard to escape the subtly drawn images once you've turned a page. Every spread is very well thought out and though the comic has only 12 pages it provides a lot of "Denkstoff"..."
finefinebooks

" Comics und Vignetten in schwarz-weißer Biedermeier-Retro-Asthetik wechseln sich ab mit gezeichneten wechselnden Gemütszuständen..."
Sonja Eismann, Missy Magazin

"...Hinter den meisterhaft gezeichneten Fassade der Arbeiten von Lilli Loge verbirgt sich mindestens Trauer, oft auch Wut und Ohnmacht..."
Peter Auge Lorenz

....................................................................................................
Lies die kind, january 2013, 14 pages, offset-print, hand-sewn binding, hand-ripped cover, first printing of 500 copies,
English

name: Nele und Sebastian in: a Blue Book

In this Tijuana Bible by Dr. Paraphylia a sad girl is having soft-bondage-sex with her boyfriend.  (German language)
............................................................................................
8 pages + printing: xeroxed + binding: hand-sewn + made by D. Paraphylia, 2008

English Version:

name: Masturbation
description:
Experimentelle Kurzgeschichten-Sammlung über Fern- und Nahbeziehungen, Einsamkeit und die traurige Seite der Sexualität.
Comic, Grafik, Fotografie und Lyrik von 1995 - 2008

name: Bible # 3
description:
This Tijuana Bible by Dr. Paraphylia is about two art-students who get it on while trying to place a picture-frame at a wall for an exhibition. 
..........................................................................................................
